hangle: 너희를 이대로 보내면 내가 공작한테 더러운 꼴을 당해서.
first_translate: if I let you  two go like this, his grace will have my head on a platter.
hey, boss...
do we cut off what’s hanging down there for these bastards?
do we cut off what’s hanging down there for these bastards?
hmm...
no... that might not be such a good idea.
thank you so much, miss.
I promise never to act rashly again.
we’re so glad you forgave us--
when did I say I was going to forgive them?
aargh!!!
it would probably be best if you closed your eyes now, lady fiona.
don’t worry about covering your ears because I’ll do that part myself.
pardon me?
okay...
alright, alright.

hangle: 자르진 말고, 한 대씩 세게 두들겨 줘.
first_translate: don’t chop anything off. just give ‘em each one hard punch instead.
sure thing.
gah...
and before you get punished,
take a good look at my face first.

hangle: 의뢰를 수행할 때, 물지 말아야 할 상대가 누군지는 기억해야지.
first_translate: you need to remember whose orders you shouldn’t disobey when carrying out missions.
y-yes, ma’am...
forgive us...
as if anyone could forget something like that.
well, looks like our little lecture is over.
now then...
time for their punishment!
aaagh!!!
next up.
argh!!!
is this place...
...the land devoured by darkness?
the bodies can’t even be recovered...
what are you planning to do next, your highness?
this area shall serve as our base camp.
from here, we must begin hunting all the monsters within the forest.

hangle: 피오나 영애는 아카데미의 연구원들과 있는 게 낫지 않을까.
first_translate: lady fiona had better stay behind with the academy researchers.
they seem quite busy themselves.
hm...
because he doesn’t want her to venture into dangerous places, right?
your highness.
work and personal matters mustn’t mix.
my place isn’t here anyway.
you know that too.
blush
that worked beautifully.

hangle: 일단 황제 폐하께 칙령도 받은 몸이니 열심히 일하죠.
first_translate: let's work diligently since we received imperial orders from his majesty himself.
go ahead and take some time off during the early stages.
wow.

hangle: …아벨이 빨리 돌아와서 네 대타가 되어야 하는데.
first_translate: abel needs to come back quickly so he can cover for you.
all she wants to do is use him.
looks like they still get along well.
where exactly makes you think that?

hangle: 이런, 어딜 봐도 어린 시절처럼 다정하신데요.
first_translate: oh, but they’re being affectionate toward each other just like they were when they were young.

hangle: 겉모습이야 두 분 다 콩나물처럼 쑥쑥 자라셨지만.
first_translate: of course, both of them grew taller than bean sprouts.
oh.
k-knight pyotr! you dropped this.
thanks very much.
is that yours?
yeah. wanna see it?
it’s my wife whom I left home.
before leaving, she told me she got pregnant.
whoa!
why didn’t you tell me sooner?!

hangle: 제 옆이 아니라 부인 곁에 있어야 되잖아요?!
first_translate: instead of protecting me, you should’ve stayed beside your wife!
can’t help it. duty calls.

hangle: 그래도 주군께서 예정일 전에 돌아가게 해 준다고 하셨으니까요.
first_translate: still, lord abel said I’d be able to return earlier than scheduled.

hangle: 아벨, 사람 부려 먹는 게 너무 독해!
first_translate: he really knows how to make people work hard!
okay.

hangle: 제가 더 빨리 헤일론으로 돌아갈 수 있도록 해줄게요.
first_translate: I'll try to finish things faster so you can return to hailon sooner.
thank you!
listen up.
even though I understand why you wanted to hurry,

hangle: 숲에 번개를 난사하면 아군이 겁을 먹는단 말이다.
first_translate: shooting lightning everywhere scares our allies.
ahaha...
at least thanks to you, everything ended quicker.
oh.
lady eunice!
lady fiona!

hangle: 영애의 힘으로 이 죽은 땅을 복구시킬 수 있을 것 같나요?
first_translate: do you believe lady eunice has enough power to restore this dead land?
maybe partially,

hangle: 이렇게 넓은 범위의 죽은 땅은 저도 처음이라…
first_translate: but I've never seen a vast stretch of dead lands like this before...
it’s due to my lack of strength.
lady eunice...
not necessarily.

hangle: 성녀님은 한 분이고, 죽은 땅은 여러 개인데…
first_translate: there may only be one saint, but many areas of dead land exist...
to start with, it’s impossible for you to handle this alone.

hangle: 맞아요, 유니스 영애가 부족한 게 아니에요
first_translate: right. it’s not because lady eunice lacks ability.
try taking it slow without rushing yourself.
exactly. we’ll also lend a hand however possible.

hangle: 어려운 부분이 있으면 혼자 앓지 말아요, 영애.
first_translate: if you encounter any difficulties, don’t suffer through them alone, okay?
everyone...
with everyone cheering me on like this,

hangle: 혼자 약한 소리를 할 수는 없어.
first_translate: I won’t show weakness anymore.
I’m sorry for worrying you all.
I’ll keep trying harder...!
wow, talk about determination.

hangle: 이러다가 너무 금방 끝내버리는 건 아닌지 몰라.
first_translate: at this rate, maybe we’ll end up finishing way too soon.
i-it wouldn’t matter either w-way...
jeez, I was joking.
